title: Improve out of the box support for running Solr on hdfs with SolrCloud.
description:
A key feature when using SolrCloud is the solr.hdfs.home param for the HdfsDirectoryFactory - you should be able to set this via sys param out of the box.

The same goes for the hadoop config folder to use.
